name: Baldi basics plus pro 2:badsum’s revenge
description:
uh oh. Guess who’s back.badsum.he took over Baldi’s school with corrupted glitches to Baldi’s friends.now they are horribly terrified.are you ready. GET READY FOR ROUND 2!If you wanna see more of this game. Give me a thumbs up. Don’t forget to follow me when I create a game.you have to stop badsum.or else. He will corrupt the hole game.
